fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select any amount of players to be put in your subgame. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In your subgame, roles are not kept. They are returned at the end of the subgame.
- 1/4th of players will be Mafia (3003A). They know who the others are.
- 1 player will be Doctor (3003B).
- 1 player will be Sheriff (30003C).
- All other players will be Townies (3003D).
- The subgame ends with the death of all Mafia, or when the Mafia have the same (or more) amount of members compared to Town.
- Dying in the subgame kills you in the real game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of your subgame.
